entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
